Courseware Graphic Design Team Lead

Learning

Slough

Graphic Design and Courseware Team Lead

Slough

Are you a current Graph Designer OR Instructional Designer looking for a new challenge, leading a small team within a fast past, challenging and fun environment?     

About our role: As a training company we constantly update and change our Courseware Manuals to ensure our delegates receive high quality, error free, eye catching (both online and offline) training material. Leading a team of three, you will have the ability to ensure the creation, design and production of all courseware is delivered in a timely, well formatted style to the QA branded guidelines. Often the documents are technical and complex, the turnover time tight with a high volume of workload. Whilst the day is busy, having an enjoyable workplace with a company you can grow and develop with is important to us.

Experience of using Adobe InDesign, Photoshop, illustrator, PowerPoint, MS office suite essential          

Your Day to Day:

Lead and direct a busy team of three

Complete production of allocated manuals and pre-course reading work within timescales.

Ensure the team are producing high quality, error free, ready to print course manuals from supplied, technically verified content in line with branding and style guidelines

To interact with the content provider on issues and enquiries arising from files or data supplied

To provide staff with electronic copies of course files or data as requested

To handle enquiries relating to the status of allocated workload

To provide creative design as and when required

To maintain publishing schedule of allocated workload using Excel

Check technical content through plagiarism tool

To support the team with general day to day queries 

Bring your experience:

Experience of creating, designing and producing high quality documents

Experience of graphic design

Expert in Word [including macros]

Intermediate in PowerPoint/Excel

Expert in InDesign, Photoshop and Illustrator

Proofreading

Scrupulous approach to detailed work

Familiarity with the production process for books and documents

Proven track record in document design

Strong written language skills

Your Learning & Development with QA, how can we support you? Naturally you will have a comprehensive Induction Programme organised and you will be introduced to various internal teams and stakeholders. You will attend our well received Company Orientation Programme and of course complete our mandatory e-learning training.  Being a training and education provider, your continuous Learning and Development is of huge importance to us and as an individual contributor, we can agree a suitable Pathway to achieve your goals and aspirations.          

Our benefits and values: Learning is not just a service we provide, it’s a way of life at QA, so everyone is eligible for 3 Training Days every year, to focus on subjects they’re interested in.

We offer 2 paid Charity Days each year to support your chosen charity in whatever way you choose AND if you get involved in charity fundraising, QA will also double any sponsorship money raised, up to £250. 

We know it’s important to recharge your batteries and enjoy some down time, so we provide a generous 25 days’ holiday per annum (rising to 28 days after 5 years) – with the option to buy more if you wish.

It’s important, too, to plan for the future and our later years, so we offer a defined contribution pension plan.

Giving peace of mind we provide by Life Assurance (4x your basic salary) and Permanent Health Insurance (after a qualifying period) in the event that ill health, or worse, disrupts our plans.

And finally, a few fringe benefits to assist with travel and lifestyle choices: Season ticket loan, Cycle to work scheme

Our Company: QA is one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK, developing skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders. Headquartered in London, but with a nationwide network of state-of-the-art training centres, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- Learning, Apprenticeships, Consulting and Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative and cutting edge skills solutions to UK organisations.

How to apply and who to contact:

Using the apply link, please submit your details and we will be back in touch shortly. Should you have any queries and wish to speak with us please call Michaela on 01753 898671

We look forward to hearing from you!

Technical Quality Manager

Apprenticeships

Home-Based

Technical Quality Manager                                        

QA Apprenticeships  

Home Based, Fulltime and Permanent Role   

OUR Role:

As a Technical Quality Manager, you will lead the internal quality assurance activities (IQA) across all business areas in the UK. 

You will be supporting Technical standards including but not limited to Infrastructure Technician, Network Engineer, Software Developer, Software Development Technician, Data Analyst, Business Analyst, Cyber Security Technologist and Unified Communications Technician. You should have general technical expertise to fully understand the requirements of these standards and support the IQA team in their activities.

You will line manage IQAs within the QAA Quality and Compliance team, working closely with Heads of Delivery in improving and standardising teaching, learning and assessment practices.

YOUR experience:

Experience of effective people management within an IQA environment.

Proven record of working to at least Ofsted Grade 2 standards

Previous experience of Quality Management Systems

Internal Audit experience

Must have excellent administrative skills with the ability to prioritise workloads, work methodically, accurately and effectively under pressure while maintaining a positive attitude

Logical thinker who is willing to own and solve problems

D34/V1/TAQA Leading the IQA process essential

Recognised teaching qualification essential

Detailed knowledge of Apprenticeship programmes

Knowledge of awarding organisation and Ofsted requirements

Good knowledge of Government funded Apprenticeship programmes

Flexibility in travel and willingness to stay away from home on occasions

 

About Us:

QA Apprenticeships (part of the QA Group www.qa.com) - As one of the fastest growing divisions of QA, we are now the UK’s leading provider of IT and business services apprenticeships. Our multi-award winning programmes have been awarded the highest possible grade by Ofsted with an amazing ‘Outstanding’ in all areas.

In return, we are offering a competitive package with the opportunity to grow and develop your career further. Interested?

UK Wide

Technical Teaching Assistant – Paid Intern Opportunity – UK wide

QA are looking for a team of individuals who have a desire to help develop the next generation of cyber and technical minds. Working up and down the UK on five day events throughout the Easter and summer holidays, these events are designed excite and inspire students aged 13 - 17 into the world of Cyber Security and Technology. Throughout the week students will work on progressive labs in combination with talks from leading experts in the Cyber field.

You will:

  • Have a passion and broad range of technical skills
  • Travel to multiple locations up and down the UK
  • Have the right to work in the UK
  • Willing to undergo an enhanced Disclosure and Barring check (DBS)

 You must:

  • Have great communication skills
  • Be approachable and continually engaging
  • Be confident in speaking to large groups
  • Be able to demonstrate working to your own initiative

Desirable but not necessary:

  • HTML Skills
  • Windows Desktop and server knowledge
  • Networking and Network infrastructure
  • IoT

If you are passionate about Cyber and Technology and the above sounds like you, then please apply today…

Training Project Manager - 6 month contract

Learning

UK Wide, London

Training Project Manager – London based with national travel.

This is a great opportunity for an experienced project manager to join us on an initial 6 month contract.

What is the role?

You will be responsible for delivery of training Projects & Programmes and Project Service focused Client engagements. Your responsibilities will include the following:

  • To provide day to day Training Project Management to teams of internal and external Trainers, Consultants, Communications, Co-ordinators and Administrators
  • To ensure Projects are defined and managed in accordance with a considered Statement of Work (SoW) and Training Plan to agreed time, cost and quality parameters
  • To engage in new opportunities, pre-sales support activities and Bids process to support business development through identification, initiation and closure of new Projects
  • To provide Communications Management supporting the creation of a communications strategy and plan as part of project initiation
  • Creation of communications collateral (in the confines of brand/internal guidelines
  • Design and document the distribution process and manage the distribution process
  • To provide Business Engagement (BE) services supporting the initiation of migration projects
  • Development of the BE process and building of the Business Champion (BC) networks
  • Development and delivery of BE collateral and ongoing networking with the BC
  • Effective control of business change and change request procedures
  • Delivery of Project Management services

What we offer?

No one wants to work for free so here’s what we give you:

A highly competitive base salary!

Must haves (We do need the following):

  • Experienced Projects Manager 5+ years
  • Training Project Management experience
  • Communications / Client engagement experience
  • Operational Management and Commercial experience helpful
  • Certified Project Management methodology ~ Prince2, APM, MSP or other
  • Client facing experience to Senior Sponsor level
  • Ability to manage multiple workstreams
  • Solution creation, project initiation, planning and budget management responsibility

What do we do?

QA is one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK, developing skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders. Headquarters in London, but with a nationwide network of state-of-the-art training centres, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative and cutting edge skills solutions to UK organisations.

If you’ve read the above, feel we are the company for you. Then apply to us today. Speak soon…

    • MSP® Foundation - from £199
    • PRINCE2® Foundation - from £99
    • PRINCE2® Practitioner - from £99
    • PRINCE2® F & P - from £149

London International House

3rd Floor, International House, 1 St Katharines Way, London, E1W 1UN

  • Tel: 0345 074 7829
  • Fax: 0345 074 7830
  • Email: info@qa.com
Page Sections

Page Sections

  • Directions

  • More
    • Where to find us
    • Centre Features
    • Directions
    • What's Nearby
    • Accommodation
    • Tour
    • Courses
Contact Us
Watch on YouTube

Flagship centre in the heart of London

QA's flagship London centre in International House provides a world-class learning environment for all course attendees.

Set in the picturesque St Katherine Docks, International House is an attractive, purpose-built facility with an enviable location just opposite the historic Tower of London and the iconic Tower Bridge.

Our state-of-the-art training centre on the third floor, with panoramic views over the city, ensures our customers continue to benefit from our investment in providing the best possible learning environment.

Where to find us

  • Open in Google maps

  • Directions

  • Print this page

  • Plan route in Google Maps

Centre features

Water cooler
Public iCafé computers
Disabled access
Parking nearby
Free Wi-Fi
Complimentary tea, coffee and biscuits
Watch on YouTube

State-of-the-art Cyber Labs

International House is home to the QA Cyber Labs, where companies can simulate real-life cyber attacks on their infrastructure, helping them to prevent & combat breaches without risking their own network.

Find out more

Directions

  • Car

  • Train

  • Bus

  • Plane
  • Starting from the M1, heading south
  • Head southeast on M1 toward Exit 2
  • At junction 2, exit onto Barnet By-Pass/Great N Way/A1 toward C. London/Holloway/A406 East/N Circular (for 3.1km)
  • Slight left onto Barnet By-Pass/N Circular Rd/Great N Way/A406 Continue to follow N Circular Rd/A406 (550m)
  • Slight right onto Falloden Way/A1. Continue to follow Falloden Way (1.3km)
  • Continue onto Lyttelton Rd (950m)
  • Continue onto Aylmer Rd/A1. Continue to follow A1 (3.3km)
  • Slight left onto Sandridge St/A1 (84m)
  • Slight left onto Holloway Rd/A1 (3km)
  • At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto Canonbury Rd/A1200. Continue to follow A1200 (2.6km)
  • Slight left onto City Rd/A501 (83m)
  • At the roundabout, take the 1st exit onto Old St/A501/A5201. Continue to follow Old St/A5201 (260m)
  • Continue onto Great Eastern St/A1202. Continue to follow A1202 (2km)
  • Turn right onto Prescot St/B126 (250m)
  • Slight left onto Mansell St/A1210 (130m)
  • Continue straight to stay on Mansell St/A1210 (170m)
  • Slight left toward St Katharine's Way (13m)
  • Slight right onto St Katharine's Way (100m)
  • Arrive at International House, on the left
  • The nearest public car park is the NCP at London Whitechapel High St: http://www.ncp.co.uk/find-a-car-park/car-parks/london-whitechapel-high-st/
  • Free motorcycle parking can be found here: https://www.cityoflondon.gov.uk/services/transport-and-streets/parking/Pages/minories-car-park.aspx
  • Walking directions from London Fenchurch Street station
  • Exit Fenchurch Street Station via lower level (there are exit stairs on each platform)
  • Turn left and walk along Coopers Row (Grange Hotel is on the left)
  • Turn left at the exit of Tower Hill station
  • Walk down the steps and through underpass adjacent to Tower Hill station entrance
  • Turn left and walk alongside the Tower of London
  • Walk straight ahead through Tower Bridge Approach underpass
  • Turn right and proceed past Tower Bridge House
  • International House is on the left. The entrance is half way along the building.
  • Routes 42, 78 and RV1 use the Tower of London stop (TL) on St. Katharine's Way, just outside International House
  • The closest airport is London City Airport

HomeTalent Solutions

Advantage Through Talent

We offer organisations innovative talent solutions that solve both business critical skills and capability gaps.

Need to develop skills, capabilities or talent?

From apprentices to technical consultants, from specific skills and capabilities to developing leaders and managers, QA enables organisations to gain advantage through their talent. Explore our Talent Solutions below.

Deployment and Development
of New Talent

Accelerate the time to deploy highly productive talent in organisations including Graduate Induction Programmes, Apprentices and Consultant programmes.

Find out more

Develop Functional and Role
Based Capabilities

Achieve professional skills and accreditations, at consistently high quality, in critical business skills including Project Management, Cyber Security, Cloud and ITIL.

Find out more

Develop Leaders, Managers
and Teams

Programmes that ensure the right knowledge, skills and behaviours, in your new and experienced managers including ApprenticeshipLevy fundedsolutions and Executive Coaching.

Find out more

Partners.

This is QA Consulting partner ecosystem

QA Consulting works with industry-leading software partners to deliver IT services to some of the UKs most recognisable organisations.

Get in touch with us!

Fill in this form or feel free to call us on
+44 1273 022670

Together with our partners, QA Consulting design, develop and deliver business and technology services and drive results, delivering a cohesive blueprint that will futureproof our customers solutions.

AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of products and services. It is an entire business architecture that enables organisations to move their on-premises...

Overview

AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of products and services. It is an entire business architecture that enables organisations to move their on-premises solutions to the cloud. AWS provides security compliant, cloud computing services, that allow for Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS) and Software as a Service (SaaS) models.

Google

Google Cloud Platform, is a suite of cloud computing services including computing, data storage, data analytics and machine learning. It provides Infrastructure as a Service, Platform as a Service,...

Overview

Google

Google Cloud Platform, is a suite of cloud computing services including computing, data storage, data analytics and machine learning. It provides Infrastructure as a Service, Platform as a Service, and Serverless Computing environments. App Engine is a platform for developing and hosting web applications in Google-managed data centers.

Microsoft

Microsoft is the worldwide leader in devices and services that help people and businesses realize their full potential. Microsoft Azure is an ever-expanding set of cloud services to help your...

Overview

Microsoft

Microsoft is the worldwide leader in devices and services that help people and businesses realize their full potential. Microsoft Azure is an ever-expanding set of cloud services to help your organisation meet your business challenges. Its the freedom to build, manage and deploy applications on a massive, global network using your favourite tools and frameworks.

Pega

Pega provide customers with the power to Engage, Simplfy, and change which results in significant revenue growth, productivity gains, and faster time to market. Pega enables seemless engagement...

Overview

Pega

Pega applications are engineered for evolution.

Pega provide customers with the power to Engage, Simplfy, and change which results in significant revenue growth, productivity gains, and faster time to market. Pega enables seemless engagement across customers, channels and contexts; it simplifies and streamlines operations end-to-end; and it empowers change, making your business fast and future-proof.

MuleSoft

With our market-leading Anypoint Platform, companies are building application networks to fundamentally change the pace of innovation. MuleSofts API-led approach to connectivity gives companies new...

Overview

MuleSoft

MuleSoft makes it easy to connect the world's applications, data, and devices.

With our market-leading Anypoint Platform, companies are building application networks to fundamentally change the pace of innovation. MuleSofts API-led approach to connectivity gives companies new ways to reach their customers, employees, and partners. companies to Global 500 corporations, use MuleSoft toOrganizations in more than 60 countries, from emerging transform their businesses.

Puppet

Puppet is an open-source software configuration management tool. It runs on many Unix-like systems as well as on Microsoft Windows, and includes its own declarative language to describe system...

Overview

Puppet

Puppet is an open-source software configuration management tool. It runs on many Unix-like systems as well as on Microsoft Windows, and includes its own declarative language to describe system configuration.

Oracle

Oracle primarily specializes in developing and marketing database software and technology, cloud engineered systems and enterprise software productsparticularly its own brands of database management...

Overview

Oracle

Oracle primarily specializes in developing and marketing database software and technology, cloud engineered systems and enterprise software productsparticularly its own brands of database management systems.

HomeTalent SolutionsFunctional Capabilities

Functional and role based capabilities

Achieve professional skills and accreditations, at consistently high quality, in critical business skills including Project Management, Cyber Security, Cloud, Data and ITIL.
Creating excellence.

Develop Capabilities

Working with organisations to build sustainable individual and organisation-wide capability and capacity to meet current and future business needs QA builds programmes to develop skills and capabilities across your professional communities that focus on:

  • Ensuring skills are developed which support and drive the business
  • Align skills to industry standards, to demonstrate professionalism
  • Facilitate career development and recruitment/selection, to provide long-term talent retention

Project and Programme Management

Ensuring timely, cost effective and impactful change across organisations is now a critical capability.
Speak to us at QA to see how we can createprofessionally qualified, high quality Programme and Project Management capabilities in your organisation.

Cyber Security Specialists

From delivering future talent Cyber scalable training solutions to deep dive Cyber training inventions, we have the content, experience and capability to develop critical Cyber Security skills for your organisation.
Speak to us at QA to see how we can create professionally qualified high quality Cyber security specialists for your organisation.

Developing L&D Professionals

We have a track-record in supporting businesses to achieve the highest level of capability with Quality Assured Learning & Development.
Speak to us at QA to see how we can create professionally qualified high quality L&D specialists for your organisation.

Cloud Specialists

Our unique relationships with leading vendors means we can offer you unrivalled training, wherever you are in your Cloud adoption journey.
Speak to us at QA to see how we can create professionally qualified high quality Cloud technologists for your organisation.

ITSM

Maximise the quality of your IT services and develop competency and capability in Service Management best practice.
Speak to us at QA to see how we can help you gain operational advantage for your organisation.

Agile

All the skills, methodologies, and behaviours needed to embed Agile in your everyday business activities.
Speak to us at QA to see how we can help you develop agility for your organisation.

Organisational Consultancy

Develop solutions that will build sustainable individual and organisational-wide capacity and capability.
Speak to us at QA's Organisational Consultancy can help your organisation.

Enable Data

QA helps organisations to power the roles, skills and capabilities to fully utilise data.
Speak to us to find out how we can help build
your data capability..

#####EOF##### Deployment and Development of Talent
Speak to one of our team
0113 220 7150
Some calls may be recorded - Learn More
Sign In to myQA
SolutionsCoursesCertificationsOnline coursesLocationsAbout QAContact UsCareers
HomeTalent SolutionsRapid Deployment

Deployment and development of talent

Our 'develop and deploy' solutions enable organisations to rapidly access and deploy productive people into their workforce.
Immediate. On Demand. Future.

Develop your talent pipeline now, and in the future.

We offer solutions to on-board new talent, deploy specific skills to targeted areas of your business, and develop talent within your organisation. From apprentices, to graduates, to technical consultants, heres how our solutions work.

Immediate Delivering niche, skilled graduates for the here and now allowing you to deploy the right skills to quickly meet the needs of projects. Injecting your business with entry-level talent to build your teams quickly through apprenticeships.

On Demand Rapid development of your graduate workforce with business-focused programmes, enabling a wide range of skills for todays workplace.

Future Designing and delivering apprentice programmes to grow junior talent pipelines, develop your future leaders or fill specialist skills gaps.

Graduate Programmes
Apprenticeship Programmes
Technical Consultants

Graduate Programmes

Graduate programmes specifically designed to meet your unique requirements and include key ingredients that ensure success:

  • Exciting, high-energy and business-focused, combining training on new skills with individual study, team work and project work.
  • Designed to replicate the working environment your graduates are being prepared for. They learn how to solve real-world problems working in a team, showing initiative and using a wide range of skills.
  • Intensive, case study and project-driven challenges where graduates work long hours. Importantly, these are made fun and we encourage networking opportunities

Apprenticeships Programmes
Tailored. Established. Superior

Use QA Apprenticeships to take your company to the next level

We care about doing things right for apprentices and employers - thats why QA Apprenticeships dont just provide training programmes we help employers utilise apprenticeships to meet their talent needs.

Tailored We have access to 1,500 QA training courses which can be used to tailor apprenticeship programmes to your specific needs. No other provider can do this

Established In our near decade of providing apprenticeships, QA have changed the lives of more than 10,000 young people (and counting). Thats a lot of apprentices actively supporting their organisations development thanks to QA.

Superior The high standard and quality of our apprenticeship programmes speak for themselves but in case you were wondering: over 92% of QA apprentices are kept on by the employer after their apprenticeship.

Deploy Technical Consultants

A cost effective blend of Strategic, Architectural and Delivery Capabilities in Specialist Technology areas that are high in demand and low in Supply.

Get technical skills - now and for the future.

Our Consultants help organisations design, develop and deliver business and technology services, delivering blueprints that future proof both the solutions and talent that.

View our Privacy Notice

QA Consulting

Talent for the Digital Age.

We provide scalable delivery capability in enterprise technology for commercial and public sector clients.

Get in touch with us!

Fill in this form or feel free to call us on
+44 1273 022670

What we do

For Businesses
For Careers

Technology Services

With more than 15 years experience of delivering market changing technology talent and solutions, our unique award-winning resourcing and knowledge transfer model provides you with a sustainable capability to fast-track the development of your mission critical systems.

See our Delivery Models

QA Learning Academy

We understand that launching your career in technology is an important step to make.

We want to give you the technical experience to excel, working at some of the leading organisations in the UK. We do this by offering you up to 12 weeks of training in high in-demand technologies. We are looking for talented degree graduates and career changers who are enthusiastic about a career in IT consultancy with an attitude to learn.

See our Academy programme

Our clients

Leading Blue Chips and Government Departments rely on QA Consulting to scale capability, reduce delivery cost and mitigate flight risk.

See clients

About Us

Part of the QA Group, we are a leading provider of digital talent and technical delivery services to enterprise and public sector customers.

Our primary purpose is to help our customers successfully exploit the opportunities that technology provides. With 15 years consulting experience, the QA Learning Academy was launched in 2011 to focus on recruiting, training and deploying high-calibre graduate consultants into our customers.

See About us

Our strategic partners

QA Consulting Partner with leading global software vendors to support build, configuration, deployment and management of their market leading solutions.

AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of products and services. It is an entire business architecture that enables organisations to move their on-premises solutions to the cloud. AWS provides security compliant, cloud computing services, that allow for Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS) and Software as a Service (SaaS) models.

Google

Google Cloud Platform, is a suite of cloud computing services including computing, data storage, data analytics and machine learning. It provides Infrastructure as a Service, Platform as a Service, and Serverless Computing environments. App Engine is a platform for developing and hosting web applications in Google-managed data centers.

Microsoft

Microsoft is the worldwide leader in devices and services that help people and businesses realize their full potential. Microsoft Azure is an ever-expanding set of cloud services to help your organisation meet your business challenges. Its the freedom to build, manage and deploy applications on a massive, global network using your favourite tools and frameworks.

Pega

Pega provide customers with the power to Engage, Simplfy, and change which results in significant revenue growth, productivity gains, and faster time to market. Pega enables seemless engagement across customers, channels and contexts; it simplifies and streamlines operations end-to-end; and it empowers change, making your business fast and future-proof.
See partners

About us.

QA Consulting is a leading provider of Consulting Services to commercial and financial organisations and Government departments.

Get in touch with us!

Fill in this form or feel free to call us on
+44 1273 022670

We excel in recruiting, training and supplying our own specialist consultants.

We operate a set of unique customer enablement programmes in which we provide industry leading capability in prominent Digital, Middleware, SaaS and Big Data technologies.

QA Consulting

Partners with leading software vendors where in-market skill shortages are apparent and costs are high. We ensure that business solutions are delivered and our customers are enabled and self-sufficient post-delivery.

The QA Consulting Academy

The QA Consulting Academy launched in 2011, focused on recruiting, training and deploying high-calibre Consultants across a range of technologies, with skills that are in high demand with limited availability.

Today, QA Consulting has a rapidly expanding customer base across multiple market sectors and geographies.

See clients

Our cultures & values

Our personal values at QA Consulting include: honesty, integrity and transparency. We apply these values daily when engaging our customers and our team.

We believe hard work, determination and a desire to constantly improve is critical to the success of our business and our customers.

Transform your skills today with our MSP online learning courses. Our online learning courses allow you the time and convenience to learn at your own pace and around your own schedule.

MSP Foundation

This eLearning course will provide you with a thorough understanding of the internationally-recognised and best practice programme management methodology Managing Successful Programmes (MSP), providing the skills you need to confidently use MSP to work within a programme.

MSP Foundation Online Learning Introduction

MSP Practitioner

MSP Practitioner is the second of the three MSP qualifications and is a pre-requisite for anyone wishing to pursue MSP Advanced Practitioner certifications.This eLearning course provides you with a thorough understanding of the MSP programme management methodology, providing you with the skills needed to confidently use MSP to manage programmes in line with strategic aims of a business and its day-to-day running.

QA Recommended

MSP Practitioner Online Learning Introduction

Find out more about our MSP Practitioner online learning course. The video gives you an overview of what the course covers and what you will learn.

MSP Foundation and Practitioner

By the end of this course, participants will have the skills to be able to identify and document the vision of a programme, thus aligning it to the strategic aims of the business. Participants will also be able to coordinate the projects of a programme to ensure the correct application of resources and risk, issue and change management. Participants will also be able to interface with the day to day business to ensure the smooth transition of changes delivered by a programme into business as usual activity and ensure that the benefits that the programme is designed to deliver are achieved.

MSP Foundation and Practitioner Online Learning with Official Manual and Online Exams

Nice to meet you

001

About Us

Learning more about a company's culture is important when considering your next career move. From our charity work to the awards we've won, we hope to give you some insight into our world and what we're really proud about.

001

12 Reasons to work for QA

QA is a company with values

We live by our corporate values of Integrity, Commitment and Service. This gives all QA employees a common way of working, which in turn ensures that we always deliver a high quality service to our customers.

Lots of career - advancing opportunities

As a growing organisation (we have grown revenue by over 300% in the last decade), there are always new challenges and opportunities just around the corner, making QA an ideal place for ambitious and hard - working individuals with a will to succeed.

Proud to be the best

You will be part of a high quality organisation (Sunday Times Best Employers One to Watch; three time winners of Apprenticeship Programme of the Year 2012, 2013 and 2014; listed on the Sunday Times Profit Track top 100 companies in 2013 and 2014).

The power of learning

As a training company we are passionate about the power of learning so, beyond any development training, we grant a minimum of three extra training days a year for you to learn a subject of your choice from our core curriculum.

We get that downtime is important

We know that in order to work hard, you need time to rest and refuel thats why we offer a generous holiday allowance of 25 days per year, which increases by an additional day once you reach 3, 4, and 5 years service, reaching 28 days per year. Just before the start of the holiday year, you can apply to buy up to five days additional leave.

We offer insurance cover and security

We offer a life assurance benefit of four times basic salary and, after one years service with the company, you can join the Companys Group Income Protection Scheme and the voluntary medical insurance scheme (the latter carries a cost). We also have a Company Pension Scheme for all employees, which includes a company contribution.

We assist you with your family costs

You can apply for childcare vouchers, which save you the cost of tax and national insurance.

We help you to be healthy employees (if you want to be)

With gym membership schemes and the Cycle to Work scheme which gives you the opportunity to buy a bicycle with tax discounts.

We know that travel can be expensive

So we offer interest - free season ticket loans up to the value of £4,999 to help with up - front public transport costs (following successful completion of your probation period).

We share success

On top of our competitive remuneration packages we have, in the last two years, paid over £300,000 annually in discretionary bonus packages to team members who are not in commission or bonus schemes.

A company that cares

All employees that have successfully completed their six month probationary period are eligible to request two days per year charity leave. As long as it is for a registered charity, employees can take advantage of two days leave at full pay. QA will also double any sponsorship money raised up to the value of £250.

We want you to tell others

We operate an employee referral scheme, so if you introduce a friend or colleague to the company, and they join and successfully pass probation, you will receive up to £1,000.

1

001

Social Events

Charity takes up a large part of our activity outside of day to day work, but we always ensure we have time to be sociable with our colleagues too. Whether its team lunches, days out, a few drinks after work or a trip abroad; we pride ourselves in ensuring our people have the opportunity to build lasting relationships which will help them thrive during their time with us.

004

Our history

In 1985, QA was founded by three former Intel employees: Mike Cheeseman, Jim Watt & Howard Kornstein. Shortly after, the company experienced its first breakthrough when it began to provide technical training to IBMs European staff and by 1990, IBM became our biggest customer.

In 1994, Learning, the longest running division of the business, was formed.

In 1999, QA acquired Cranbrook Training and the training division of CapGemini, allowing us to begin teaching project management and business analysis as part of our QA Learning offering.

In 2006, one of the biggest changes to the business came with the skills and expertise gained from the acquisition of Interquad, and we subsequently further acquired competitor companies Xpertise Group and Remarc Group, strengthening our position as the UKs leading business & IT training company.

In 2008, we launched our Apprenticeships division. We were the first IT apprenticeships business rated Ofsted Outstanding; offering IT, developer, digital marketing, project management and business apprenticeships throughout England and Scotland.

In 2011, we acquired Aikona Management, which brought advancement to our project management training and consultancy course areas. Within our Higher Education division, we launched our first University partnership with Ulster University, offering undergraduate and postgraduate programmes in our London and Birmingham campuses.

In 2014 F1 Computing provided key CRM & IT training to QA. We launched our partnership with Northumbria University, our second University partner, delivering undergraduate top-ups and postgraduate programmes at a new London campus, and pathway programmes at Northumbrias Newcastle campus.

In 2015 QA acquired the NETbuilder academy, now known as QA Consulting, providing consulting services to government & business sectors. We launched our partnership with Roehampton University; providing pathway programmes at Roehamptons London campus, and a mix of undergraduate programmes taught in centres located in London (Holborn) and Birmingham.

In 2016 we welcomed our 10,000th Apprentice through QAs Apprenticeship programme, and expanded our offering with the University of Roehampton with undergraduate programmes at our Manchester centre.

The quality of our proposition has never been stronger, with more learning experts, more dedicated facilities and further advancement in our solutions within Education.

1985
1994
1999
2006
2008
2011
2014
2015
2016
2017

001

Charity

Joining QA is not just about doing your day job. Throughout the year, we all get involved in charity fundraising and volunteering, going as far as dedicating two days annually to giving something back.

We hold a vote to decide upon our partner charity each year, to allow every one of our colleagues to have their say on who we should support. This year, weve partnered withCentrepointand were off to a great start with our fundraising and events.

Every office is involved, and its great to take some time out to support and raise as much as we can to help the causes we care about.

Last year we partnered with the NSPCC and are proud to have raised over 52,500 for them. This year we have set our sights high, and we are hoping to go further still in 2018.

001

QA Supporting the Armed Forces

We recently co-signed the Armed Forces Covenant, with Brigadier Paul Buttery (Hd TESSRR) and have pledged to support military spouses, service leavers, Veterans, Reservists, Cadets and Adult Cadet Volunteers, with training and career opportunities to help bridge the UKs digital skills gap.

QAs pledges within the Armed Forces Covenant include:

  1. Training 1000 service leavers, veterans, reservists, military spouses, and cadet adult volunteers as part of the AWS re:Start programme (including employing a minimum of 100 as QA Consultants).
  2. Promoting technology apprenticeships to cadets (16-18).
  3. Offering free and subsidised technology training to the Families Federations Army, Navy and Air Force.
  4. Offering free and subsidised technology training to the Officers Association.
  5. Offering free and subsidised technology training to the Womens Section Royal British Legion.
  6. Promoting employment opportunities for service leavers and veterans in cyber security training through the Career Transition Partnership (CTP).
Meet Russell who has recently joined us from the Armed Forces

Approaching the civilian job market with confidence is hugely important for Service Leavers, Reservists, Veterans and military spouses as well as Cadets. By providing accredited training in cutting-edge technology skills and facilitating work placements within the thriving IT industry, QA are building on the skills Service Personnel and their families already have and supporting them in becoming even more competitive and attractive to potential employers. With todays signing of the Covenant, QA are joining over 1,500 Armed Forces friendly organisations and helping create exciting career pathways for our Armed Forces community.

Brigadier Paul Buttery

#####EOF##### Managed Learning Services
Speak to one of our team
0113 220 7150
Some calls may be recorded - Learn More
Sign In to myQA
SolutionsCoursesCertificationsOnline coursesLocationsAbout QAContact UsCareers
HomeMLS

Efficient. Effective. Learning.

Independently recognised as one of the UK's leading outsourced and managed learning service providers, we deliver value and achieve tangible savings for our customers.

Explore our Managed Learning Services

QAs Managed Learning Services enable organisations to deliver more impactful learning experiences, increase efficiency in learning administration and increase value for money in all aspects of an organisations learning and development operation.

Our approach is one centred around partnership, where QA becomes an extension of our customer's L&D function, so that we can bring our wealth of experience in managing, sourcing and delivering all aspects of learning, so that the L&D function can focus on the more strategic matters in hand.

The QA service offering is never 'standard' as we tailor each service to the needs of the organisation. No two customers have the same set of requirements, so it is vital that a clear definition of the service is agreed, with QA's UK based service teams aligned to provide the necessary customer service and support.

QA doesnt just focus on a single sourcing solution in order to reduce costs, we provide expert insight and guidance across the L&D function and the wider learning marketplace to increase value, whilst supporting your journey to improve individual and business performance.

Service Management

Design, Delivery & Continuous Improvement

MI and Analytics

  • Service reporting - activity and SLA
  • Learning reports - Evaluation & Quality reports
  • Benchmarking data

  • Enquiry handling advice

  • Access to learning solutions and innovation

Service Delivery

  • Service governance & review
  • Service evaluation - reporting and management
  • Benefits realisation
  • Continuous Improvement (Service, learning delivery)
  • Issue management and complaints handling

Implementation and change management

  • Service definition - Learning process design, Technology implementation/integration
  • Implementation - project and change management
  • Communications, engagement and adoption

Service Management

From the initial steps of service implementation to the maturity of a third year of service provision, relationships and communication are critical to an effective service. We ensure that we deploy the right people with the prior knowledge and skills to really make a difference. Continuous improvement is driven through insightful data, benchmarking and bringing in our wealth of experience from supporting many other organisations.

  • Service design & delivery service definition, implementation, governance and execution
  • Relationship management a partnership focused on delivering success
  • Customer service desk - dedicated team to guide and support learners
  • MI & Analytics insight and data to drive continuous improvement
Find out more

Learning Operations

By transferring the administration and procurement of external learning to QA, you can focus on the strategic value of learning and the performance of your people, whilst developing and retaining your top talent. Our teams ensure we track, manage and report on all the tactical aspects of learning support and delivery, so we can demonstrate the tangible efficiencies.

  • Training administration - improving your learning experience
  • Supplier Management market insight, procurement and benchmarking
  • Evaluation & benchmarking improve quality and driving improvements
  • Portals & LMS improving access to learning through integrated technology
Find out more

Skills and Capability Development

In-house expertise and experience to support customers with the alignment of learning strategy to business needs. Our learning consultants can support all types of engagement from designing bespoke and blended learning programmes to supporting capability needs assessments.

Find out more

Santander- Trusted Partner in Learning

"Re-imagining customer service"

Business Drivers

To achieve the ambition of becoming known as the Best Retail Bank in the UK, Santander is undertaking an extensive transformation programme. Future Forward was conceived to ensure that people development is urgently addressed. Together, we deliver an extraordinary learning solution; drawing from
best-in-class external providers, under the umbrella of QAs MLS.

How We Worked Together

QA are engaged to work in partnership with the internal programme team and Learning Team. Our role is to manage all external learning providers who are contributing to the design, development and delivery of the learning solution, and to bring world-class learning and development thinking and innovation to the programme

Services Delivered

Our learning solution is a 24-month blended learning journey, comprising learner, manager and stakeholder engagement, workshops, embedding and coaching activities - as well as a web-based learning portal. Our learning solution is underpinned by 70:20:10; as well as delivering a blended solution, we have built a learning community, mobilised their leadership to support them, and delivered this via a new social learning portal.

Managed Learning Services leadership team

Giles Smith

Giles holds key responsibility to design and deliver bespoke learning solutions in support of our customers.

Contact Giles

David Brindle

Working with organisations to help create value-adding learning services, to enable increased return on investment from their learning budgets.

Contact David

Louise Hagan

Head of Managed Learning Services, responsible for the delivery of all administrative and service support for our MLS customers. Also responsible for the provision of all third party delivery solutions across QA Learning

Contact Louise

We are QA

Who we are and what we do

Our business areas

001

Careers at QA

Established in 1985, our business has evolved into an all-encompassing organisation with Education at the heart of all we do.

Since the early years, we have diversified our client offering to become the UKs number one Training provider and added another three award winning strings to our bow in Consulting, Higher Education and Apprenticeships.

We are proud to transform the performance of individuals and businesses through learning. Whether were supporting Trainee and Apprenticeship careers, working with our University partners to deliver quality Undergraduate and Masters Degrees, training professionals in cutting edge courses or working with our clients to consult and deliver against their business needs; what drives us to deliver the very best for our clients is underpinned by our values of commitment, service excellence and integrity.

Our teams of learning professionals are amongst the best in the world, each with extensive experience and a proven track record of delivering the skills that transform performance and ensure lasting benefits. And we dont stop there. Everyone who joins us can take advantage of the training we offer to support their own career development by dedicating two days a year to their own learning.

Education, careers and business need to fill skills gaps to compete in an exciting ever-changing world is evolving - and nothing we do can work without a strong, diverse workforce behind us every step of the way. Our culture is our people. We are in a unique position to make a difference to the world of education, and we want you to be a part of our journey.

001

Latest vacancies

SQL & BI Trainer x 3 roles

Learning

London

Read More

SQL & BI Trainer x 3 roles

Your SQL knowledge it not up-to-date but you would love to upgrade it? Do you love developing others and helping them to grow?

We are offering a great and rare opportunity to upskill your SQL knowledge, to learn from the best and to become a Certified Trainer

If you have decent knowledge of SQL and would like to move into training, QA will be happy to support you on this journey

Extensive initial training up to two months including refreshing your subject matter knowledge and getting you the necessary certifications (MCT and MCSE – to name just a few!).  Every QA trainer stays up to date with the cutting edge and new technologies, so these two months will be just a start of your professional journey with us.

You will go through “Train the Trainer” sessions and will be shadowing some of our highly successful and professional trainers to get you ready to face delegates in the classroom.

Please have a look at the list of technical qualifications required:

Decent knowledge of the following:  

  • SQL Server 2008/2012 (Administration and Development)
  • Analysis Services 2008/2012
  • Integration Services 2008/2012
  • Reporting Services (BIDS 2008/2012 / Report Builder 2.0-3.0)
  • Data Warehouse Design Methodology

Please apply with your CV, we look forward to talking to you!

Graduate Web Development Trainer

Learning

Site-Based, London, UK Wide

Read More

Graduate Web Development Trainer

Have you ever wanted a career in technology? Considered training other people? QA are looking for digitally curious individuals to join our Trainer team. QA will help you realise your potential and invest in you as part of a structured programme of learning and mentorship.

You will become a Web Developer Trainer following an extensive 6 to 8 weeks programme in our Manchester based Training Academy.

You will have a passion for the web and some evidence of these skills as well as tutoring or coaching experience.  In return, QA will outfit you with a set of technical, research and teaching skills in your new career.

You will have:

  • Good communication and interpersonal skills - be able to form a rapport quickly with people and make them feel comfortable; ability to break down complex scenarios into simpler chunks and explain them
  • A Bachelor’s Degree (ideally in a STEM-related subject)
  • Be geographically flexible – the role is London based with UK wide travelling
  • Enthusiasm for life-long learning - both for themselves and in others
  • Adaptive - be able to think on your feet when things go wrong or when removed from your comfort zone
  • Reflective - Be empirical in your practice and analyze how to improve your delivery/materials
  • Be numerate and literate to a high level

Key skills:

  • An appreciation of how the web works
  • Skills in HTML/CSS
  • Some experience in a programming language, preferably JavaScript
  • An understanding of databases – either relational or no SQL
  • An understanding of what UI/UX are

Nice to Have:

  • Experience of creating responsive, interactive web sites and applications
  • Experience in one of more UI library/frameworks (React, Angular, Vue, etc)
  • Experience in server-side programming (Java, C#, PHP, etc)
  • Experience in databases for the web (SQL, Mongo, IndexedDB, etc)
  • Experience in cloud platforms such as Amazon or Azure.

Selection Process: following an initial telephone screening you will complete an aptitude test (online) and attend an assessment day.

If you were successful, you will join our Manchester based Training Academy for a 12 weeks subject based course. Following the successful completion of the course you will get additional training skills coaching and training that will take up to four weeks and could be based anywhere in the UK.

Our Company: QA is one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK, developing skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders. Headquartered in London, but with a nationwide network of state-of-the-art training centres, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative and cutting edge skills solutions to UK organisations.

Our benefits and values:

Learning is not just a service we provide, it’s a way of life at QA, so everyone is eligible for 3 Training Days every year, to focus on subjects they’re interested in.

We offer 2 paid Charity Days each year to support your chosen charity in whatever way you choose AND if you get involved in charity fundraising, QA will also double any sponsorship money raised, up to £250. 

Recharge your batteries and enjoy some downtime, so we provide a fairly generous 25 days’ holiday per annum (rising to 28 days after 3 years) – with the option to buy more if you wish.

It’s important, too, to plan for the future and our later years, so we offer a defined contribution pension plan and will match your contributions up to a maximum of 3% of your basic salary.

Giving peace of mind we provide by Life Assurance (4x your basic salary) and Permanent Health Insurance (after a qualifying period) in the event that ill health, or worse, disrupts our plans.

And finally, a few fringe benefits to assist with travel and lifestyle choices: Season ticket loan, Cycle to work scheme

Salary range:

In return, we offer an excellent remuneration package with company benefits and development opportunities to enable you to reach your full potential.

How to apply and who to contact:

Using the link below, please submit your details and we will be back in touch shortly. Should you have any queries please call Natalie Erukhimovich from the Recruitment team on 01753 898651.

We look forward to hearing from you!  

Graduate Cloud Trainer x 3 roles

Learning

UK Wide, London, Site-Based

Read More

Graduate Cloud Trainer x 3 roles

Have you ever wanted a career in technology? Considered training other people? QA are looking for digitally curious individuals to join our Trainer team. QA will help you realise your potential and invest in you as part of a structured programme of learning and mentorship.

You will become a Cloud Trainer following an extensive 6 to 8 weeks programme in our Manchester based Training Academy.

You may have a background in networking, automation, or Linux administration and an interest in becoming a hands-on Cloud practitioner and skills coach.  In return, QA will outfit you with a set of technical, research and teaching skills in your new career.

You will have:

  • Good communication and interpersonal skills - be able to form a rapport quickly with people and make them feel comfortable; ability to break down complex scenarios into simpler chunks and explain them
  • A Bachelor’s Degree (ideally in a STEM related subject)
  • Be geographically flexible – the role is London based with UK wide travelling
  • Enthusiasm for life-long learning - both for themselves and in others
  • Adaptive - be able to think on your feet when things go wrong or when removed from your comfort zone
  • Reflective - Be empirical in your practice and analyze how to improve your delivery/materials
  • Be numerate and literate to a high level

Key skills:

  • An appreciation of what Cloud and Devops is and why industry is adopting them
  • Some experience of Linux configuration, administration and scripting
  • Some programming experience, preferably Python or Ruby
  • Exposure to the cloud
  • Awareness of software testing
  • Understanding of Agile and Lean

Nice to Have:

  • Experience with continuous integration and release technologies
  • Use of version control using Git
  • Experience of test and quality automation
  • Process improvement and change.

You will learn: 

  • How to create and manage DevOps release pipelines
  • Certified Agile and Lean skills
  • Cloud engineering skills including certification
  • Test Automation skills including certification

 

Selection Process: following an initial telephone screening you will complete an aptitude test (online) and attend an assessment day.

If you were successful, you will join our Manchester based Training Academy for a 12 weeks subject based course. Following the successful completion of the course, you will get additional training skills coaching and training that will take up to four weeks and could be based anywhere in the UK.

Our Company: QA is one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK, developing skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders. Headquartered in London, but with a nationwide network of state-of-the-art training centres, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative and cutting edge skills solutions to UK organisations.

Our benefits and values:

Learning is not just a service we provide, it’s a way of life at QA, so everyone is eligible for 3 Training Days every year, to focus on subjects they’re interested in.

We offer 2 paid Charity Days each year to support your chosen charity in whatever way you choose AND if you get involved in charity fundraising, QA will also double any sponsorship money raised, up to £250. 

Recharge your batteries and enjoy some downtime, so we provide a fairly generous 25 days’ holiday per annum (rising to 28 days after 3 years) – with the option to buy more if you wish.

It’s important, too, to plan for the future and our later years, so we offer a defined contribution pension plan and will match your contributions up to a maximum of 3% of your basic salary.

Giving peace of mind we provide by Life Assurance (4x your basic salary) and Permanent Health Insurance (after a qualifying period) in the event that ill health, or worse, disrupts our plans.

And finally, a few fringe benefits to assist with travel and lifestyle choices: Season ticket loan, Cycle to work scheme

Salary range:

In return, we offer an excellent remuneration package with company benefits and development opportunities to enable you to reach your full potential.

How to apply and who to contact:

Using the link below, please submit your details and we will be back in touch shortly. Should you have any queries please call Natalie Erukhimovich from the Recruitment team on 01753 898651.

We look forward to hearing from you!  

Devops Trainer

Consulting

Manchester

Read More

Devops Trainer

Are you passionate about technology?

Looking for a new challenge with a company that has won Computing Magazine DevOps Excellence Awards 2017?

Sounds interesting? Please read on…

QA Ltd is the UK’s number 1 technical training provider. With over 6000 clients and operating within 80% of the FTSE 250, we are a world leader of IT training. QA Consulting, a division of QA Ltd, have the unique ability to use this world-class training to provide outstanding consultants to the largest companies in the UK. QA Consulting have an academy in Manchester where we train our consultants in market-leading technologies and we are looking to grow our training scheme.

Overview

This role is for an Academy trainer in QA Consulting who has a strong to expert knowledge in DevOps and/or Linux administration.

Desirable experience:

  • Operating systems: Linux (Ubuntu, Centos, REHL)
  • Cloud platforms: AWS, Azure, GCP
  • Configuration management: Chef, Docker, Puppet or Chef
  • Containerisation: Docker and Kubernetes
  • Scripting: Bash, Python and Ruby

This role is for someone who is passionate about learning and experimenting with the latest trends in engineering and also enjoys imparting knowledge to others.

If you like to research, learn and impart your technical skills onto others then this role is for you. You will have excellent customer facing, interpersonal and communication skills, along with the ability to work independently.

At QAC we look for real experts in their field who are passionate about their subject. We don’t expect everyone to come to us as specialists in training as well (although that would be nice) – we can provide that part as we are experts in learning and development.

Training courses typically follow groups of graduates who will be shaped in order to prepare them to start careers in the most exciting areas of technology in some of the biggest organisations in the UK.

 Key Responsibilities 

  • To deliver both bespoke courses in relation to DevOps and cloud computing
  • To take responsibility for developing and maintaining agreed courses
  • To maintain an up-to-date skills base through personal development and accreditation activities
  • Keep and report data on completed courses, absences, issues etc.
  • Determine course content according to objectives

 Skills and experience required 

  • Solid DevOps experience gained in a commercial environment
  • Solid Linux skills
  • Exposure to continuous integration, cloud and configuration management
  • Knowledge of modern training techniques and tools in technical subjects
  • Degree in a relevant technical field
  • Excellent organizational and time management abilities
  • Web Front end experience is advantageous but not essential
  • Outstanding communication skills and comfortable speaking to crowds

 Benefits 

  • Competitive salary
  • Contributory Pension Scheme
  • Regular social events that include technical talks and hackathons
  • Continued support in your personal development

Please apply now for immediate consideration.

 

Amazon Web Services (AWS) Trainer

Learning

London

Read More

Amazon Web Services (AWS) Trainer

Do you want to put your AWS experience to greater use?

Are you currently an Amazon Web Services qualified professional who enjoys coaching in your current role but feel your experience could be used to teach?

Then why not become an AWS Trainer!

Why apply?

If you’re based in (or near) London, had enough of contracting or your permanent role is no longer challenging you. How about doing something different and working for one of the UK’s largest Education providers, where you help others understand the world of Amazon Web Services …then this role is perfect for you.

What is the role?

Based in London (near Tower Hill tube station), you will be delivering both public scheduled and bespoke courses for all appropriate areas of QA’s AWS  Portfolio.

With our support, you will deliver/coach using face to face, e-Learning or digital AWS courses and content to all appropriate areas within QA to likeminded people. Whether they are a highly qualified professional or a beginner looking to get into the world of AWS. 

How will we support you?

Using your AWS experience, we will help you achieve your Trainer/Coaching accreditation/qualification which gives you the confidence and knowledge to teach/coach.

You will also be assigned a co-pilot/buddy to help get you up to speed throughout your training period and beyond.

Financial package and benefits 

We are offering a competitive base salary (dependant on experience), private pension as well as 25 days holiday. 2 days paid Charity work each year for a charity of your choice (which we actively encourage), 3 days of additional training which does not need to be relevant to your role from our very own course selection (1,200 to be precise) and cycle to work scheme.

Must have's:

  • Recent hands-on experience with AWS infrastructure services.
  • AWS certification
  • Experience architecting, deploying and operating Internet-scale operations
  • Experience with virtualization technologies or cloud services

Nice to have’s:

  • Linux or Windows command line skills.
  • Coding experience in one or more of Java, .NET, Perl, PHP, Ruby or Python.
  • Experience in the delivery of AWS or relevant course

Who are we?

As one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK. We like to help develop skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders.  With our HQ in London and 20 training centres nationwide, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative, award-winning (2016 Top 20 IT Training Companies List) & ever-evolving skills solutions.

So interested? If so please apply today…

 

 

 

 

Operations Project Planner

Learning

Slough

Read More

Operations Project Planner

Loud, outgoing, process focused and friendly! Does this sound like the sort of environment you would like to work in?

Then keep reading to find out more…

What is the role?

As part of our Operations team, you will be responsible for supporting our wide-ranging client base, managing our Trainers diaries effectively and internal/external venues to ensure our delegates receive our award-winning programmes.

Dealing with high volumes of email requests and calls from internal/external stakeholders, in this role you will need to be process focused with the ability to multitask and negotiate. You will be required to prioritise your ever-evolving workload as well as troubleshooting any issues using your own initiative to create logical solutions.

With this in mind you will be given support whilst you learn the role…

How will we support you?

It’s really important to make sure you have the support required to deal with this busy but challenging position, however, with a highly experienced Manager and team, we will train you to ensure you understand the role.

You will have an in-depth 1-2-1 training programme to get you up to speed in the first week as well as a dedicated mentor for the first three months.

You will be joining a team of six who like to create a loud, fun & friendly environment.

Financial package and benefits 

Competitive base salary, private pension as well as 25 days holiday, 2 days paid Charity work each year for a charity of your choice (which we actively encourage), 3 days of additional training which does not need to be relevant to your role from our very own course selection (1,200 to be precise), and cycle to work scheme.

What do we do?

QA is one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK, developing skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders. Headquarters in London, but with a nationwide network of state-of-the-art training centres, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative and cutting edge skills solutions to UK organisations.

Must haves (We do need the following):

  • Previous experience in a busy office environment
  • Processed focus and must be able to think on their feet whilst making decisions
  • Great people skills (sounds cliché but building relationships is a key part of this role)

If you’ve read the above, feel we are the company for you. Then apply to us today. Speak soon…

Sales Executive

Learning

Manchester

Read More

Sales Executive

Sales Executive (Graduates Welcome to apply, full training provided) 

Central Manchester 

Working within a vibrant and successful sales team, our role is primarily a telephone-based cold calling position involving profiling of accounts, meeting generation and prospect building. Over time, the role will evolve into an account management position and depending on the success level of each sales person, an external client facing position managing a portfolio of key accounts

Our role is suitable for a recent graduate. Sales experience is very welcome, but not mandatory. We will provide you with comprehensive training at QA Sales Academy to help you on your way with a rewarding career. 

As the Sales Executive, you will:

  • Create sustainable business relationships
  • Identify business opportunities and provide accurate forecasting of pipeline sales
  • Prepare quotes and proposals for customers
  • Provide effective Customer service management
  • Maintain all relevant management information systems
  • Prospect for new customers
  • Provide support to the Sales Manager

 As the Sales Executive, you will have:

  • An entrepreneurial spirit and determination
  • Confidence and a strong sense of direction
  • Excellent communication skills
  • The ability to operate well and contribute to a strong team environment
  • Self-motivation and drive
  • Strong understanding of sales processes
  • A deep understanding of the need to respond quickly to requests
  • Good attention to detail
  • Degree: Undergraduate or Graduate

Our Company: QA is one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK, developing skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders. Headquartered in London, but with a nationwide network of state-of-the-art training centres, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative and cutting edge skills solutions to UK organisations.

Location: Manchester

competitive basic salary + commission package

Sounds interesting? Please apply with your CV, we look forward to talking to you!

Sales Executive

Learning

Slough

Read More

Sales Executive

Are you looking for your first step into the sales industry? Or have you maybe had a little bit of sales experience previously but are looking for the right company to really develop those skills within? If you are, then we want you!

You will manage a portfolio of existing spending accounts, whilst developing new business opportunities within new areas of the business to grow this further. You will be part of a dedicated and highly skilled team, who work closely to deliver great results and build long-lasting relationships. You will develop a strong understanding of the clients’ needs and opportunities, so that you can provide the best service possible.

You will be given accounts, which will be a mixture of spending accounts, previously spending but currently lapsed accounts to re-generate, and cold accounts which need some TLC to build up to become new spending accounts, selling over 1500 courses from the QA Learning portfolio!

You will sell using a consultative sales approach, which you will receive full training and mentoring on.

With a competitive basic salary + commission package, it’s a great opportunity to develop your career within Account Management, with fantastic set progression routes throughout the company. You really can be in control of your earnings and career prospects.

Get in touch today to begin your career journey with QA!

Citrix Trainer

Do you want to put your CITRIX experience to greater use?

Are you currently a Citrix qualified professional who enjoys coaching in your current role but feel your experience could be used to teach?

Then why not become a Citrix Trainer!

Why apply?

If you’re based in (or near) London, had enough of contracting or your permanent role is no longer challenging you. How about doing something different and working for one of the UK’s largest Education providers, where you help others understand the world of Citrix …then this role is perfect for you.

What is the role?

Based in London (near Tower Hill tube station), you will be delivering both public scheduled and bespoke courses for all appropriate areas of QA’s CITRIX Portfolio. Netscaler products will play a prominent part in your Citrix course deliveries.

With our support, you will deliver/coach using face to face, e-Learning or digital Citrix courses and content to all appropriate areas within QA to likeminded people. Whether they are a highly qualified professional or a beginner looking to get into the world of Citrix. 

Travelling will be likely to up to 30% of your time, UK wide.

How will we support you?

Using your Citrix experience, we will help you achieve your Trainer/Coaching accreditation/qualification which gives you the confidence and knowledge to teach/coach.

You will also be assigned a co-pilot/buddy to help get you up to speed throughout your training period and beyond.

Financial package and benefits 

We are offering a competitive base salary (dependant on experience), private pension as well as 25 days holiday. 2 days paid Charity work each year for a charity of your choice (which we actively encourage), 3 days of additional training which does not need to be relevant to your role from our very own course selection (1,500 to be precise) and cycle to work scheme.

Must haves:

  • Recent hands-on experience with CITRIX:
    • Citrix Application Delivery Controllers.
    • Citrix Virtual Applications and Virtual Desktops.
    • Citrix Hypervisor.
    • Citrix Cloud.
  • Readiness to pick up Netscaler products range

Nice to have’s:

  • CITRIX CCI certification
  • Experience in the delivery of Citrix or relevant course
  • Experience with Netscaler products line

Who are we?

As one of the largest learning services organisations in the UK. We like to help develop skills and capabilities for everyone from apprentices to business leaders.  With our HQ in London and 20 training centres nationwide, QA Group is comprised of four fast-growing divisions- QA Learning, QA Apprenticeships, QA Consulting and QA Higher Education- all of which deliver innovative, award-winning (2016 Top 20 IT Training Companies List) & ever-evolving skills solutions.

So interested? If so please apply today…

Sales Executive

Are you looking for your first step into the sales industry? Or have you maybe had a little bit of sales experience previously but are looking for the right company to really develop those skills within? If you are, then we want you!

You will manage a portfolio of existing spending accounts, whilst developing new business opportunities within new areas of the business to grow this further. You will be part of a dedicated and highly skilled team, who work closely to deliver great results and build long-lasting relationships. You will develop a strong understanding of the clients’ needs and opportunities, so that you can provide the best service possible.

You will be given accounts, which will be a mixture of spending accounts, previously spending but currently lapsed accounts to re-generate, and cold accounts which need some TLC to build up to become new spending accounts, selling over 1500 courses from the QA Learning portfolio!

You will sell using a consultative sales approach, which you will receive full training and mentoring on.

With a competitive basic salary depending on experience and great commission package, it’s a great opportunity to develop your career within Account Management, with fantastic set progression routes throughout the company. You really can be in control of your earnings and career prospects.
